landing.title: ... We are the fastest
landing.description: Deliver your products to any place with a one-stop, full-service next-day delivery and logistics solution

track.enter: Enter your shipment code to track

about.title: ?Who We Are
about.description: Telegraph For Freight & Courier Services L.L.C. Telegraph contributes to community development by providing a range of commercial services that support the development and development plan. Telegraph has the honor to offer its customers various services in the field of shipping, unloading, shipping and cash collection services (C.O.D) as soon as possible and offer our services a competitive prices. Telegraph offers all its services through a group of highly qualified and challenging management
about.info_1: Telegraph is a company that invites technology to the logistics industry to create a seamless delivery experience
about.info_2: Telegraph is a fast growing courier and logistics company based in Alexandria, Egypt
about.info_3: Telegraph was founded in 2019 with a vision to introduce market leading express delivery and logistics services to the region

services.title: Our Services
services.d1: Create your shipment before 12:00 pm time and we gladly arrive to your doorsteps to collect the pickup in the same day
services.d2: Our promise is to deliver the next day we receive the pickups, depending on the drop-off city location
services.d3: Exchange a shipment for another through our smart system
services.d4: Telegraph returns customers' shipments as quickly and safely as possible
services.d5: We collect your inventory from you and store it safely in our fulfillment centers
services.d6: We offer cash collection services in more than one way, including bank and electronic transfers, as well as receipt from company branches or through a cash representative

features.title: Our Awesome Features
features.d1: Telegraph also offers cash collection and cash on delivery (COD) services as an option for all its customers without any additional fees
features.d2: We handle every aspect and requirement of your e-commerce, from keeping your products securely stored in our strategically located facilities and making sure they are properly packaged and shipped, to securely managing the cash collections and returns process
features.d3: Monitor & track your shipments online from placing the order till delivery through the company's website or through the company's application
features.d4: We receive your shipment from your home and deliver to the customer's home

statistics.title: Some Important Statistics That Will Make You Satisfied ...
statistics.description: Now you can join us and enjoy a leading and professional delivery experience at very competitive prices and benefit from all our services provided in this field, here are some of our statistics and successes so far
